abstractive.text: The Project Manager introduced himself and the project to the group.

abstractive.text: The Marketing Expert will present the user requirement specification and will research which devices the remote will control.

abstractive.text: The group had some difficulties setting up their computers and using the smartboard.

abstractive.text: The group discussed energy source options but could not decide between using standard batteries or a recharging stand.
abstractive.text_fr: Le groupe a discuté de la source d'énergie des options, mais ne pouvait pas décider entre l'utilisation des piles standard ou une base de charge.

abstractive.text: The group discussed ways in which they could make the remote look unique but could not decide if the remote should have a unique folding-open design or if it should be made in a more standard, square shape.
